channel.title: Variable help [PI]
channel.description: i have [code]c.getPA().addSkillXP(500, 22);[/code] in my NPCHandler.java, but when i compile it says "cannot find symbol, variable c" but whenever i try to declare the variable it just adds more errors, any help would be appreciated

item.title: Variable help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

In the method you have to put Client c
I believe try that and pm me if u hav any errors.
